kevin-cui.name: Kevin Cui
kevin-cui.title: Co-Founder & State Ambassador
kevin-cui.roleDescription: As a founder, I work with my partner to oversee and direct all aspects of the organization, namely chapter establishment, curriculum development, and outreach/growth initiatives.
kevin-cui.about: Hey, I'm Kevin Cui, a sophomore at Jasper High School in Texas and the co-founder of AI in STEM. I'm extremely passionate about technology, especially AI, machine learning, and robotics, while also being deeply committed to making education freely accessible to all, regardless of circumstances. Through AI in STEM, I'm able to bring these passions together by building chapters across the nation and developing a free, detailed yet student-friendly online curriculum to empower STEM-interested youth.
kevin-cui.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing.

aarav-rao.name: Aarav Rao
aarav-rao.title: Co-Founder & State Ambassador
aarav-rao.roleDescription: As a founder, I work with my partner to oversee and direct all aspects of the organization, namely chapter establishment, curriculum development, and outreach/growth initiatives.
aarav-rao.about: Hey everybody, My name's Aarav Rao. I'm currently a sophomore at Jasper High School in Texas and the other co-founder of AI in STEM. I‚Äôm really into technology, especially AI and machine learning, but I also care a lot about using tech in a way that‚Äôs good for the planet and making education something everyone can access. Through AI in STEM, I get to combine these interests by creating chapters across the country and building a free, easy-to-use online curriculum that helps students learn about STEM without feeling left behind.
aarav-rao.quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.

shanmukha-bommana.name: Shanmukha Bommana
shanmukha-bommana.title: Curriculum Developer
shanmukha-bommana.roleDescription: As a curriculum developer, I work on designing & creating student-friendly and detailed educational slideshows, articles and other resources used by chapters across the nation.
shanmukha-bommana.about: Hi, I'm Shanmukha Bommana, a senior at Aubrey High School in Texas. I'm passionate about AI and its development in the future, looking forward to working with AI and incorporating it more into our daily lives than thought possible. The opportunities and mission of AI in STEM led me to join, as for me, AI has always been a passion, and the thought that I could help others learn and use AI really got my attention and was an opportunity I couldn't pass up.
shanmukha-bommana.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

smyan-reddy.name: Smyan Reddy
smyan-reddy.title: State Ambassador & Chapter President
smyan-reddy.roleDescription: As a Chapter President and State Ambassador, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters across Georgia.
smyan-reddy.about: I'm Smyan Reddy, an ambitious freshman at Lambert High School in Suwanee, Georgia. I'm passionate about the role of AI in the modern world and how it impacts one major part of life: STEM. The embodiment of the future rests in the palm of AI, and I want to accelerate the impact by educating individuals about how the future could be enunciated through the proper use and development of Artificial Intelligence. I'm an avid golf player, a budding coder and competitive programmer, and I actively pursue my passion for playing the violin.
smyan-reddy.quote: Do not put to tomorrow what can be done today.

tejus-peri.name: Tejus Peri
tejus-peri.title: State Ambassador, Chapter President & Curriculum Developer
tejus-peri.roleDescription: As a Chapter President and State Ambassador, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters across Georgia. Additionally, in the Georgia chapter, I also work on social media outreach and graphic design, along with being a curriculum developer and mentor!
tejus-peri.about: My name is Tejus Peri, and I am a freshman at Alliance Academy for Innovation. I am passionate about aerospace, research, and innovation, and I hope to one day contribute to groundbreaking advancements in aviation and space exploration. I joined AI in STEM because I wanted to explore how artificial intelligence can be applied to real-world challenges while collaborating with other motivated students. I also play the euphonium and enjoy competing in chess tournaments!
tejus-peri.quote: No retreat, no surrender; that is Spartan law.

samdeesh-thukral.name: Samdeesh Thukral

samdeesh-thukral.about: Hi! My name is Samdeesh Thukral and I am currently a freshman in Lambert High School. I have a passion for Cybersecurity, and it relates to AI in STEM because AI enhances Cybersecurity, while Cybersecurity protects AI.
samdeesh-thukral.quote: Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it

sai-vikhyath-belda.name: Sai Vikhyath Belda

sai-vikhyath-belda.about: My name is Sai Vikhyath Belda, but I go by Vicky. I go to Lambert High School, my current year is 9th. I also like to advertise business, organization etc. This relates to the impact I want to make at AI In STEM by me being helpful as an outreach manager.
sai-vikhyath-belda.quote: If you had a goal, and actually believe you can do it, your halfway there.

aditya-pradhan.name: Aditya Pradhan

aditya-pradhan.roleDescription: As a Chapter President, State Ambassador, and Outreach Manager, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters while also focusing on outreach and community engagement strategies.
aditya-pradhan.about: My name is Aditya Pradhan, and I'm a senior at Richard Montgomery High School. I'm passionate about using analytical thinking and technology to solve messy, real-world problems. As president of my school's Finance Club and an IB student researching defense economics, I've learned to combine quantitative models with careful ethical thinking. At AI in STEM I want to build interpretable AI tools that help non-specialists access data-driven answers for example, lightweight models that help small research teams analyze experimental results, or explainable systems that help policymakers understand trade-offs in resource allocation.
aditya-pradhan.quote: If you want a thing done well, do it yourself

By combining my passion for technology with an interest in neuroscience, I aim to explore innovative solutions that bridge the gap between data science and medicine through AI in STEM.
ram-suhrut-seelamankalugari.quote: Continuous effort‚Äînot strength or intelligence‚Äîis the key to unlocking our potential.

I will make an impact with AI in STEM by empowering youth and interested individuals about the world of AI in STEM. I hope to help this organization spread globally in the near future!
supraj-gonur.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

surya-sreenivasan.name: Surya Sreenivasan
surya-sreenivasan.title: Chapter President & Curriculum Developer
surya-sreenivasan.roleDescription: As Chapter President and Curriculum Developer, I lead my local chapter and work on developing engaging AI and STEM curriculum to make learning accessible and fun for students.
surya-sreenivasan.about: Hi! I'm Surya Sreenivasan, a junior from Phoenix, Arizona, and I serve as both Chapter President and Curriculum Developer for AI in STEM. My passion lies at the intersection of artificial intelligence, machine learning, and educational technology. I believe that AI has transformative potential across industries, and I'm dedicated to making AI education accessible to high school students everywhere. Through my work with AI in STEM, I focus on creating hands-on learning experiences that demystify complex concepts and inspire the next generation of innovators. When I'm not coding or developing curriculum, you can find me participating in competitive programming contests, exploring the latest developments in neural networks, or mentoring younger students in STEM subjects.
surya-sreenivasan.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

raghunand-dayanandan.name: Raghunand Dayanandan
raghunand-dayanandan.title: Chapter President & Curriculum Developer

raghunand-dayanandan.about: My name is Raghunand Dayanandan, and I am a sophomore at Jasper High School. I am passionate about furthering my knowledge as well as others in areas involving STEM. Through AI in STEM, I will achieve my goal as I will be able to impact people across the world by teaching them STEM. I am pursuing learning Machine Learning for LASER, manage Jasper Chess Club as its Secretary, and am helping serve the community as Vice President of my own STEM club Technic Box.
raghunand-dayanandan.quote: Only a life lived for others, is a life worthwhile

akhil-boddu.name: Akhil Boddu
akhil-boddu.title: Chapter President, Outreach Manager & Curriculum Developer
akhil-boddu.roleDescription: As a Chapter President, Outreach Manager, and Curriculum Developer, I lead local initiatives, oversee community engagement efforts, and create comprehensive educational resources to support STEM education initiatives while building partnerships to expand AI in STEM's reach and impact.
akhil-boddu.about: My name is Akhil Boddu, and I am a junior at Frisco High School in Texas. I am passionate about learning Machine Learning and AI, and I honestly want to be a quant. Through AI in STEM, I want to make these cutting-edge technologies more accessible to students and help bridge the gap between theoretical concepts and real-world applications. A fun fact about me is that I am double jointed!
akhil-boddu.quote: The first and best victory is to conquer self.

achyutan-veeraghavan.name: Achyutan Veeraghavan
achyutan-veeraghavan.title: Chapter President, State Ambassador
achyutan-veeraghavan.roleDescription: As a Chapter President and State Ambassador, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters across Oregon.
achyutan-veeraghavan.about: Hello! I am Achyutan Veeraraghavan, a junior at Sunset High School and the chapter president for Portland, Oregon. I have always been interested in STEM topics, specifically math, coding, and AI/ML from a young age. I also got many opportunities to compete at the state and national levels to show my skills. I also recognize that not all students have opportunities like this, due to either their background, falling behind in school, or other personal reasons. Due to this, I want to help contribute to AI in STEM and their mission: to equalize education and learning for all in the machine learning field through clubs and workshops, so that school students can strive to be successful in college and beyond. I am currently running a club at Kinnaman Elementary School, teaching the kids about coding (specifically in Python). I am also planning to start some monthly workshops in my chapter in AI/ML starting later this school year.

shreel-belbase.name: Shreel Belbase
shreel-belbase.title: Chapter President, State Ambassador, Curriculum Developer
shreel-belbase.roleDescription: As a Chapter President, State Ambassador, and Curriculum Developer, I lead local initiatives, represent AI in STEM at the state level, and create educational content to expand STEM education across Maryland.
shreel-belbase.about: Hi, I'm Shreel! I am currently a Senior at Richard Montgomery High School. I am passionate about Engineering and Computer Science along with Math and I want to educate others about how AI, an upcoming vital tool, can be optimized in these various fields. One fun fact about me is I am fluent in 5 languages! (Excluding the computer languages!)
shreel-belbase.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

harinita-senthil.name: Harinita Senthil
harinita-senthil.title: Curriculum Developer
harinita-senthil.roleDescription: As a Curriculum Developer, I create educational content to spread awareness about the role and importance of AI and how it is transforming modern careers, particularly in biotechnology and computer science.
harinita-senthil.about: Harinita Senthil studies at Forsyth Central High School as a sophomore. She is particularly interested in how artificial intelligence integrates with STEM fields, such as through revolutionary tools like CRISPR used in biotechnology and gene editing. As a future Curriculum Developer, she hopes to make an impact by spreading education on the role and importance of AI and how it is transforming modern careers. One fun fact about her is that she is actively working on projects such as a nonprofit organization named Innovative Minds 4 Tech, where they spread AI tools and information on biotechnology and computer science all across Cumming, GA. She is also actively working on environmental projects such as the Climate Leaders Fellowship and Project ARISE which is focused on environmental policy advocating and projects for a better sustainable future.
harinita-senthil.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.

aaryan-vishnupurikar.title: Chapter President & Outreach Manager
aaryan-vishnupurikar.roleDescription: As Chapter President, I lead local initiatives and help students discover their future careers in AI. As Outreach Manager, I work to expand our reach and connect with more communities.
aaryan-vishnupurikar.about: Hi there! My name is Aaryan, and I'm an eighth grader at Windemere Ranch Middle School. AI in STEM helps me grow my network, so I can lead people to their future careers based on AI. I also spend a lot of my time practicing violin!
aaryan-vishnupurikar.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.

shashank-kesineni.name: Shashank Kesineni
shashank-kesineni.title: Chapter President & Outreach Manager
shashank-kesineni.roleDescription: As Chapter President, I lead local initiatives to inspire students to explore AI. As Outreach Manager, I work to expand our reach and connect with more communities interested in AI education.
shashank-kesineni.about: My name is Shashank Kesineni and I am a sophomore at Rock Ridge High School and the Academies of Loudoun (AET) with a focus in computer science. I am passionate about AI and how it can be used to solve real-world problems, especially in sustainability and education. As a Chapter President for AI in STEM, I hope to inspire other students to explore the creative and ethical potential of AI.
shashank-kesineni.quote: The future depends on what you do today.

justin-lee.name: Justin Lee
justin-lee.title: Chapter President & State Ambassador
justin-lee.roleDescription: As Chapter President and State Ambassador, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters across New Jersey.
justin-lee.about: Hey, I'm a junior at Westfield High School with a passion for mathematics, physics, and computer science. I'm committed to democratizing education through my volunteering, and spreading my passion for STEM. Through AI in STEM, I'm able to bring my passions together to build a network and empower students in STEM.
justin-lee.quote: If you think you understand quantum mechanics, you don't understand quantum mechanics.

bavine-opiyo.name: Bavine Opiyo
bavine-opiyo.title: Chapter President & State Ambassador
bavine-opiyo.roleDescription: As Chapter President and State Ambassador, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters across Kenya.
bavine-opiyo.about: My name is Bavine Opiyo, and I attend Jomo Kenyatta University. I'm passionate about neuroscience and artificial intelligence in the brain sciences. I love doing innovation and being creative.
bavine-opiyo.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

robert-qi.name: Robert Qi
robert-qi.title: Chapter President & Curriculum Developer
robert-qi.roleDescription: As Chapter President and Curriculum Developer, I lead local initiatives and create educational content to help make STEM education accessible to all students.
robert-qi.about: I am Robert Qi, a senior at Westfield High School in NJ. I'm passionate about computer science and machine learning, particularly artificial intelligence. AI in STEM will allow me to turn my interests into real world impacts by creating chapters across the nation and creating a free online course to help all children interested in STEM no matter their economic situation.
robert-qi.quote: We are the cosmos made conscious and life is the means by which the universe understands itself.

shanmuka-gottimukkala.name: Shanmuka Gottimukkala
shanmuka-gottimukkala.title: Chapter President, Outreach Manager & Curriculum Developer
shanmuka-gottimukkala.roleDescription: As a Chapter President, Outreach Manager, and Curriculum Developer, I lead local initiatives, oversee community engagement efforts, and create comprehensive educational resources to support STEM education initiatives while building partnerships to expand AI in STEM's reach and impact.
shanmuka-gottimukkala.about: My name is Shanmuka Gottimukkala, and I am a sophomore at Milton High School with a strong passion for computer science, artificial intelligence, and problem solving with the combination of technology and psychology. I am especially interested in using AI to make advanced STEM tools more accessible and impactful for students who may not otherwise have exposure to them. Through AI in STEM, I hope to contribute to efforts that expand hands on learning, research opportunities, and real world application of technology for students globally. Fun fact: I enjoy creative projects like 3D modeling and visual design in my free time.
shanmuka-gottimukkala.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
shanmuka-gottimukkala.chapterCurriculum: Official AI in STEM curriculums, teaching the impact of AI and how it can be utilized in day to day life to expedite tasks.
shanmuka-gottimukkala.chapterMeetingLocation: Virtual meetings (Possible expansion into Milton High School)

priyanka-handique.name: Priyanka Handique
priyanka-handique.title: Chapter President, State Ambassador & Outreach Manager
priyanka-handique.roleDescription: As a Chapter President, State Ambassador, and Outreach Manager, I lead local initiatives, represent AI in STEM at the state level, and oversee community engagement efforts to expand STEM education and make AI accessible to all students.
priyanka-handique.about: Priyanka Handique is a curious and passionate high school student and AI enthusiast, driven to make STEM and health technology accessible for everyone. She actively explores new ideas, participates in online STEM initiatives, and mentors peers, inspiring others to discover the possibilities of artificial intelligence. Through AI in STEM, she aims to spark curiosity, empower learners, and create meaningful impact in education and technology. Outside of tech, she loves experimenting with new tools and turning her ideas into real, actionable solutions.
priyanka-handique.quote: Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.
